entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
